name: Subdreamer-CMS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Whether your goal is creating a simple or full scale website, Subdreamer will get you there by providing unbeatable content management tools.

matches.name: powered by text #1
matches.text: Website powered by Subdreamer CMS

matches.name: powered by text #2
matches.regexp: (?-mix:<a href="http:\/\/www.subdreamer.com[\/]*" title="Website powered by Subdreamer[\ CMS]*">Website powered by Subdreamer[\ CMS]*<\/a>)
